trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs> is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> event.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs> viene creato quando il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> oggetto genera il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> event when it begins speaking a prompt using any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> genera il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> evento quando inizia un prompt dei comandi utilizzando uno del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> metodi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs> class has no properties, and does not return data from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs> non dispone di propriet√† di classe e non restituisce dati dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> evento.

trans-unit.source: It is provided to enable application authors to write event handlers for the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> event.
trans-unit.target: Viene fornito per consentire agli autori di applicazioni scrivere gestori eventi per il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> evento.
